basic_information.scholarship_name: Joan Gilmore Endowed Scholarship in Mass Communication

description: The purpose of this fund is to provide scholarships to students with Mass Communication majors. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Mass Communication major Must be a Sophomore Must have a minimum of 3.0 GPA Must be a member of a student-related or professional organization(s) This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current Student scholarship application season.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
